titleNullable: News Headlines & Summary from select 12 sources
subtitleNullable: Collection of news headlines & summaries over the past six months.
descriptionNullable:
### Context

This is the first version of a news title and summary dataset that will increase over time. I have build a project to pull news feeds  via API calls, running daily and appending the data locally. 

The potential use cases I think this would be good for is text generation, news bias analysis in presentation of a same story and sentiment analysis.

### Content

This csv contains news data, including the source, author, title, description, origin of the news and more. 


### Acknowledgements

Powered by NewsAPI.org (a fantastic API service, strongly suggest signing up).

### Inspiration

My inspiration is the desire to empirically classify the objectivity of news sources via comparative analysis and also to deeper understand the style of writing and language used by media outlets.
